cause.description:
The Time is Now...
Yes it is Summer time but we need to come together to complete the last item on our checklist which is to Fundraise money for our charter...
Goal is as high as we can achieve... Sky is the limit...
Minium goal is to gain $1,500.00
Let's start now...
1. Fellowship
2. Leadership
3. Scholarship
4. Service
cause.mission: To become a Chapter of Kappa Sigma Fraternity and remain as the first fraternity at LSU Alexandria!!!
cause.name: Kappa Sigma Chapter at LSU Alexandria
